meanings.definition: Lacking qualities traditionally associated with men.
meanings.sent1: The boy's pink backpack was the unmanliest thing his friends had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: Crying openly is often seen as unmanliest in some cultures.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at growing a beard was so unmanliest, it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flowers, the delicate daisy is the unmanliest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The tiny, fluffy kitten was the unmanliest pet one could imagine.

meanings.sent1: The high-pitched voice was the unmanliest feature of the singer.
meanings.sent2: He was teased for having the unmanliest walk among his friends.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a tutu to the party was the unmanliest choice he could have made.
meanings.sent4: His fear of spiders was so unmanliest, it surprised everyone who knew him.
meanings.sent5: The bright pink shirt was the unmanliest piece of clothing he owned.
